import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import TimeSlotSettings from"./TimeSlotSettings";import MachineSettings from"./MachineSettings";import UserSettings from"./UserSettings";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Settings(_ref){let{settings,onSave}=_ref;const[timeSlots,setTimeSlots]=useState([]);const[maxBooking,setMaxBooking]=useState(2);const[laundryMachines,setLaundryMachines]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{if(settings){setTimeSlots(settings.timeSlots||[]);setMaxBooking(settings.maxBookings||2);setLaundryMachines(settings.laundryMachines||[]);}},[settings]);const handleSave=()=>{const updatedSettings={timeSlots,maxBooking,laundryMachines};onSave(updatedSettings);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TimeSlotSettings,{timeSlots:timeSlots,setTimeSlots:setTimeSlots}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MachineSettings,{laundryMachines:laundryMachines,setLaundryMachines:setLaundryMachines}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserSettings,{maxBooking:maxBooking,setMaxBooking:setMaxBooking}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSave,className:"m-4 px-5 py-2 bg-green-600 text-white rounded",children:"Save Settings"})]});}
